130 class CullFaceSetting : public RenderSetting {
131 public:
132  //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
135 
136  enum CullSettingFlag {
137  kModifyEnable = 1 << 0, // Whether or not to modify if culling is enabled
138  kModifyFace = 1 << 1 // Whether or not to modify the face that is culled
139  };
140  typedef QFlags<CullSettingFlag> CullFlags;
141 
142  static CullFaceSetting Current(RenderContext& context);
143 
145 
146  //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
149  CullFaceSetting();
150  explicit CullFaceSetting(CulledFace culledFace);
151  explicit CullFaceSetting(bool cull);
152  CullFaceSetting(bool cull, CulledFace culledFace);
153  ~CullFaceSetting();
154 
156 
157  //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
160 
161  virtual RenderSettingType settingType() const override {
162  return RenderSettingType::kCullFace;
163  }
164 
165 
166  bool isSettingEnabled() const { return m_cullFlags & kModifyEnable; }
167  bool isSettingCullFace() const { return m_cullFlags & kModifyFace; }
168 
170  bool cullFace() const { return m_cullFace; }
171  void setIsCullFace(bool cull) { m_cullFace = cull; }
172 
174  CulledFace culledFace() const { return m_culledFace; }
175  void setCulledFace(CulledFace culledFace) { m_culledFace = culledFace; }
176 
178 
179  //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
182 
183  virtual void set(RenderContext& context) const override;
184 
186 
187  //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
190 
191  bool operator==(const CullFaceSetting& other) const;
192  bool operator!=(const CullFaceSetting& other) const;
193 
195 
196  //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
199 
201  virtual QJsonValue asJson(const SerializationContext& context = SerializationContext::Empty()) const override;
202 
204  virtual void loadFromJson(const QJsonValue& json, const SerializationContext& context = SerializationContext::Empty()) override;

219 
220  //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

227  bool m_cullFace;

239 enum class TransparencyRenderMode {
240  kOpaque = 0,
241  kTransparentNormal,
242  kTransparentAdditive, // Adds colors together, so result will be brighter than either
243  kTransparentSubtractive // Darkens colors behind the material by subtracting the material's colors from the background colors
244 };

349 enum class DepthPassMode {
350  kNever = GL_NEVER,
351  kLess = GL_LESS,
352  kEqual = GL_EQUAL,
353  kLessEqual = GL_LEQUAL,
354  kGreater = GL_GREATER,
355  kNotEqual = GL_NOTEQUAL,
356  kGreaterEqual = GL_GEQUAL,
357  kAlways = GL_ALWAYS
358 };
359 
361 class DepthSetting : public RenderSetting {
362 public:
363  //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
366 
367  enum DepthSettingFlag {
368  kModifyWrite = 1 << 0, // Whether or not to modify write value
369  kModifyTesting = 1 << 1, // Whether or not to toggle testing
370  kModifyPassMode = 1 << 2 // Whether or not to modify pass mode
371  };
372  typedef QFlags<DepthSettingFlag> DepthFlags;
373 
374  static DepthSetting Current(RenderContext& context);
375 
377 
378  //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
381  DepthSetting();
382  DepthSetting(bool enableTesting, DepthPassMode depthPassMode);
383  DepthSetting(bool enableTesting, DepthPassMode depthPassMode, bool writeToDepthBuffer);
384  DepthSetting(DepthPassMode depthPassMode, bool writeToDepthBuffer);
385  ~DepthSetting();
386 
388 
389  //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
392 
393  virtual RenderSettingType settingType() const override {
394  return RenderSettingType::kDepth;
395  }
396 
397  size_t depthFlags() { return m_depthFlags; }
398 
399  bool isSettingDepthWrite() const { return m_depthFlags & size_t(kModifyWrite); }
400  bool isSettingTesting() const { return m_depthFlags & size_t(kModifyTesting); }
401  bool isSettingPassMode() const { return m_depthFlags & size_t(kModifyPassMode); }
402 
403  bool isTestEnabled() const { return m_testEnabled; }
404  void setTestEnabled(bool enabled) { m_testEnabled = enabled; }
405 
406  bool isWritingDepth() const { return m_writeToDepthBuffer; }
407  void setWriteDepth(bool write) { m_writeToDepthBuffer = write; }
408 
409  DepthPassMode depthPassMode() const { return m_passMode; }
410  void setDepthPassMode(DepthPassMode mode) { m_passMode = mode; }
411 
413 
414  //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
417 
418  virtual void set(RenderContext& context) const override;
419 
421 
422  //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
425 
426  bool operator==(const DepthSetting& other) const;
427  bool operator!=(const DepthSetting& other) const;
428 
430 
431 
432  //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
435 
437  virtual QJsonValue asJson(const SerializationContext& context = SerializationContext::Empty()) const override;
438 
440  virtual void loadFromJson(const QJsonValue& json, const SerializationContext& context = SerializationContext::Empty()) override;
441 
443 
444 protected:
445  friend class RenderSettings;
446 
447  //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
450 
452  virtual void cacheSettings(RenderContext& context) override;
453 
455 
456  //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
459 
460  size_t m_depthFlags;
461 
463  bool m_testEnabled;
464 
466  bool m_writeToDepthBuffer;
467 
469  // GL_ALWAYS The depth test always passes.
470  // GL_NEVER The depth test never passes.
471  // GL_LESS Passes if the fragment's depth value is less than the stored depth value.
472  // GL_EQUAL Passes if the fragment's depth value is equal to the stored depth value.
473  // GL_LEQUAL Passes if the fragment's depth value is less than or equal to the stored depth value.
474  // GL_GREATER Passes if the fragment's depth value is greater than the stored depth value.
475  // GL_NOTEQUAL Passes if the fragment's depth value is not equal to the stored depth value.
476  // GL_GEQUAL Passes if the fragment's depth value is greater than or equal to the stored depth value.
477  DepthPassMode m_passMode;
478 
480 };
481 
482 
485 enum class StencilPassMode {
486  kNever = GL_NEVER,
487  kLess = GL_LESS,
488  kEqual = GL_EQUAL,
489  kLessEqual = GL_LEQUAL,
490  kGreater = GL_GREATER,
491  kNotEqual = GL_NOTEQUAL,
492  kGreaterEqual = GL_GEQUAL,
493  kAlways = GL_ALWAYS
494 };
495 
496 enum class StencilBufferOp {
497  kKeep = GL_KEEP,
498  kZero = GL_ZERO,
499  kReplace = GL_REPLACE,
500  kIncr = GL_INCR,
501  kIncrWrap = GL_INCR_WRAP,
502  kDecr = GL_DECR,
503  kDecrWrap = GL_DECR_WRAP,
504  kInvert = GL_INVERT
505 };
506 
508 class StencilSetting : public RenderSetting {
509 public:
510  //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
513 
514  enum StencilMask {
515  kDisabled = 0x00, // Each bit ends up as 0 in the stencil buffer (disabling writes)
516  kEnabled = 0xFF // Each bit is written to the stencil buffer as is
517  };
518 
519  enum StencilSettingFlag {
520  kModifyWrite = 1 << 0, // Whether or not to modify write value
521  kModifyTesting = 1 << 1, // Whether or not to toggle testing
522  kModifyPassMode = 1 << 2, // Whether or not to modify pass mode
523  kModifyOp = 1 << 3 // Whether or not to call glStencilOp, which sets how stencil buffer updates
524  };
525  typedef QFlags<StencilSettingFlag> StencilFlags;
526 
527  static StencilSetting Current(RenderContext& context);
528 
530 
531  //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
534  StencilSetting();
535  ~StencilSetting();
536 
538 
539  //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
542 
543  virtual RenderSettingType settingType() const override {
544  return RenderSettingType::kStencil;
545  }
546 
547 
548  bool isSettingStencilWrite() const { return m_stencilFlags & size_t(kModifyWrite); }
549  bool isSettingTesting() const { return m_stencilFlags & size_t(kModifyTesting); }
550  bool isSettingPassMode() const { return m_stencilFlags & size_t(kModifyPassMode); }
551  bool isSettingOp() const { return m_stencilFlags & size_t(kModifyOp); }
552 
553  bool isTestEnabled() const { return m_testEnabled; }
554  void setTestEnabled(bool enabled) { m_testEnabled = enabled; }
555 
556  bool isWritingStencil() const { return m_mask != StencilMask::kDisabled; }
557  void setWriteStencil(bool write) { m_mask = StencilMask::kEnabled; }
558 
559  StencilPassMode stencilPassMode() const { return m_passMode; }
560  void setStencilPassMode(StencilPassMode mode) { m_passMode = mode; }
561 
562 
564 
565  //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
568 
569  virtual void set(RenderContext& context) const override;
570 
572 
573  //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
576 
577  bool operator==(const StencilSetting& other) const;
578  bool operator!=(const StencilSetting& other) const;
579 
581 
582 
583  //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
586 
588  virtual QJsonValue asJson(const SerializationContext& context = SerializationContext::Empty()) const override;
589 
591  virtual void loadFromJson(const QJsonValue& json, const SerializationContext& context = SerializationContext::Empty()) override;
592 
594 
595 protected:
596  friend class RenderSettings;
597 
598  //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
601 
603  virtual void cacheSettings(RenderContext& context) override;
604 
606 
607  //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
610 
611 
612  size_t m_stencilFlags;
613 
615  bool m_testEnabled;
616 
617  GLuint m_mask = (GLuint)(StencilMask::kEnabled);
618 
619  // The stencil test passing mode
620  // GL_ALWAYS The stencil test always passes.
621  // GL_NEVER The stencil test never passes.
622  // GL_LESS Passes if the fragment's stencil value is less than the reference value.
623  // GL_EQUAL Passes if the fragment's stencil value is equal to the reference value.
624  // GL_LEQUAL Passes if the fragment's stencil value is less than or equal to the reference stencil value.
625  // GL_GREATER Passes if the fragment's stencil value is greater than the reference stencil value.
626  // GL_NOTEQUAL Passes if the fragment's stencil value is not equal to the reference stencil value.
627  // GL_GEQUAL Passes if the fragment's stencil value is greater than or equal to the reference stencil value.
628  StencilPassMode m_passMode = StencilPassMode::kEqual;
629 
630  // Reference value
631  GLint m_ref = 1;
632 
633  // Control how to actually update the stencil buffer
634  // GL_KEEP The currently stored stencil value is kept.
635  // GL_ZERO The stencil value is set to 0.
636  // GL_REPLACE The stencil value is replaced with the reference value set with glStencilFunc.
637  // GL_INCR The stencil value is increased by 1 if it is lower than the maximum value.
638  // GL_INCR_WRAP Same as GL_INCR, but wraps it back to 0 as soon as the maximum value is exceeded.
639  // GL_DECR The stencil value is decreased by 1 if it is higher than the minimum value.
640  // GL_DECR_WRAP Same as GL_DECR, but wraps it to the maximum value if it ends up lower than 0.
641  // GL_INVERT Bitwise inverts the current stencil buffer value.
642 
644  StencilBufferOp m_failOp;
645 
647  StencilBufferOp m_depthFailOp;
648 
650  StencilBufferOp m_passOp;
651 
653 };
654 
657 enum class PrimitiveMode {
658  kPoints = GL_POINTS,
659  kLines = GL_LINES,
660  kLineStrip = GL_LINE_STRIP,
661  kLineLoop = GL_LINE_LOOP,
662  kTriangles = GL_TRIANGLES,
663  kTriangleStrip = GL_TRIANGLE_STRIP,
664  kTriangleFan = GL_TRIANGLE_FAN
665 };
666 
669 class RenderSettings : public Serializable{
670 public:
671 
672  //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
675 
677  static void CacheSettings(RenderContext& context);
678 
680 
681  //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
684  RenderSettings(const QJsonValue& json);
685  RenderSettings();
686  ~RenderSettings();
688 
689  //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
692 
693  // TODO: Used for depth sorting, fully implement
694  const TransparencyRenderMode& transparencyType() const { return m_transparencyMode; }
695  void setTransparencyType(const TransparencyRenderMode& type) {
696  m_transparencyMode = type;
697  }
698 
699 
701  PrimitiveMode shapeMode() const { return m_shapeMode; }
702  void setShapeMode(PrimitiveMode shapeMode) { m_shapeMode = shapeMode; }
703 
705 
706  //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
709 
711  inline const RenderSetting* setting(RenderSettingType type) const {
712  return m_settings[type];
713  }
714 
716  void overrideSettings(const RenderSettings& other);
717 
719  void addDefaultBlend();
720 
722  void addSetting(const RenderSetting& setting);
723 
724  template<typename T, typename ...Args>
725  RenderSetting& addSetting(Args&&... args) {
726  static_assert(std::is_base_of_v<RenderSetting, T>, "Error, T must be a RenderSetting subclass");
727  auto setting = new T(std::forward<Args>(args)...);
728 
729  // Clear old setting, and set as new one
730  if (m_settings[(int)setting->settingType()]) {
731  delete m_settings[(int)setting->settingType()];
732  }
733  m_settings[(int)setting->settingType()] = setting;
734  return *m_settings[(int)setting->settingType()];
735  }
736 
738  void bind(RenderContext& context);
739 
741  void release(RenderContext& context);
742 
744  void clearSettings();
745 
747 
748  //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
751 
753  virtual QJsonValue asJson(const SerializationContext& context = SerializationContext::Empty()) const override;
754 
756  virtual void loadFromJson(const QJsonValue& json, const SerializationContext& context = SerializationContext::Empty()) override;
757 
759 
760 private:
761  //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
764 
766 
767  //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
770 
772  std::array<RenderSetting*, RenderSettingType::kMAX_SETTING_TYPE> m_settings;
773 
775  PrimitiveMode m_shapeMode;
776 
777  // TODO: Used for depth sorting, fully implement
779  TransparencyRenderMode m_transparencyMode = TransparencyRenderMode::kOpaque;
780 
782 };
783 
784 
786 } // end namespacing
